column4: Hey guys, I'm interested in performing some network data transfer and speed tests, can anyone recommend some tools or ideas of how to obtain speed metrics to show management? I really only know of running '$ time {sftp|ftp|svn|git}' commands to show time of transfer downloads. Any thoughts/ideas?
I'd like to show transfers with time/speed/bandwidth metrics for things like downloading from a central server from across our global WAN.
